channel.title: Can't LogIn
channel.description:
hey guys so whenever i download a server online and i try to play on it, it says error connecting to server..
PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!!!!

item.title: Can't LogIn
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

Make sure to have the source running and to change the ip in the client to 127.0.0.1 . reply with the revision and i’ll tell you which files they are in.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't LogIn
item.dc:creator: @gtbarry gtbarry
item.description:
@gtbarry wrote:

Woah, Hold up a bit.

Let me clear this up.

You downloaded a source and client and attempted to get it running?

if that’s the case, change the ip of the client and/or server (client.java, settings.java, or something similar is what it’ll be.)
if that’s done, and you can’t connect, Try to portforward

Read full topic
